description: A court order staying proceedings or execution in a case, often pending appeal or other proceedings

stay_type.description: Type: stay_of_proceedings, stay_of_execution, interim_stay, automatic_stay, conditional_stay

stay_duration.description: Duration of stay (e.g., 'until appeal disposed', '6 months', 'indefinite')

stay_order_reference.description: Reference to stay order in records

indexes: CREATE INDEX stayed_type IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:STAYED]-() ON (r.stay_type)
CREATE INDEX stayed_order_date IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:STAYED]-() ON (r.stay_order_date)
CREATE INDEX stayed_status IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:STAYED]-() ON (r.stay_status)
CREATE INDEX stayed_vacation IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:STAYED]-() ON (r.vacation_date)
usage_examples:
// Find all active stays
MATCH (staying:Case)-[s:STAYED]->(stayed:Case)
WHERE s.stay_status = 'active'
RETURN staying.citation, stayed.citation, s.stay_reason, s.stay_order_date, s.stay_duration
ORDER BY s.stay_order_date DESC

// Find cases with stay pending appeal
MATCH (appellate:Case)-[s:STAYED]->(lower:Case)
WHERE s.stay_type = 'stay_of_execution'
  AND s.stay_status = 'active'
  AND s.stay_duration CONTAINS 'appeal'
RETURN appellate.citation, lower.citation, s.stay_conditions
